overview: Mixing it up has always been the recipe for success when it comes to making the best cocktails – a sentiment that director, John Smith, is keen to adopt when introducing his best Staxus crew to the joys of raw gay sex. As such it’s no time at all before the recipes at hand are soon being overshadowed by the unbridled lust between the likes of William Buchanan, Lucian Beaumont and Calum Dean; as one stiff drink turns into a whole host of stiff cocks, with mouths and asses soon eagerly opening up as a result. And rest assured every last detail quickly gets captured, with some of the hottest, horniest all-boy sex ensuing for every twink-lover’s delight. All topped off by a tsunami of spunk to make this a cocktail to remember!
title: Twink Twins Cocktail
